creator: Rolls-Royce CoDC Development
descriptionHtml:
The Rolls-Royce Trent 7000 Pilot Guide app is an interactive reference tool for the engine making the best better for the Airbus A330neo. The app brings together educational material and real engine characteristic data to allow an airline pilot to understand the engine that delivers the power for the Airbus A330neo aircraft. This is complemented with the latest Rolls-Royce operational recommendations for the best use of the Trent 7000, and the latest understanding on environmental factors that may need to be considered when flying with the engine.

The app provides an opportunity to learn about the key modules and components of the Trent 7000 through the interactive ‘Engine Overview’ feature and understand how they work together to deliver a range of ‘Engine Systems’.

• See how the Trent 7000 interacts with the cockpit via ‘ECAM Displays’ and ‘ECAM Messages’.
• Understand how these work together to deliver the characteristic operation of the Trent 7000 engine.
Our ‘Operational Recommendations’ can be explored via an interactive airport feature.
• Understand how operational decisions on engine warm-up, single engine taxy, thrust reduction, reverse thrust and engine cool-down can significantly affect the operation and cost of ownership of advanced aero engines.

• Learn how to manage these effects to get the best from your Trent 7000.
Environmental factors have always been a significant consideration for aviators everywhere. This remains true even for the most modern aircraft and aero engines, where the need for the best efficiency and aircraft availability pushes already advanced technology equipment to new heights.

• Learn about some of the key ‘Environmental Factors’ and how they interact with a Trent 7000.
• Understand the latest available operational advice and recommendations for when these conditions are encountered.

This Trent 7000 Pilot Guide app is provided free of charge for Rolls-Royce Trent 7000 customers. To access the content of the app you will need a Rolls-Royce supplied log in that you will need to verify during your first use of the app. If you are not an approved Rolls-Royce Trent 7000 customer then you will be unable to access the app content.
descriptionShort: The Rolls-Royce Trent 7000 Pilot Guide app is an interactive reference tool.
title: Trent 7000 Pilot Guide
